message: So I've just started watching it after some friends suggested I do so. One thing that bugs me - why did Pattys son come back to the house for the laptop? They made such a big scene about it it must have some relevance
Ah, so it's relevant! I did think so, the seasons tie everything up so perfectly/meticulously I thought it was odd they'd forgotten this
Keep watching!  Everything means something.  I loved this show!
(you've made me want to go back and watch the first season!)
'second' what everyone else said... this is one of the most well thought out shows i've ever seen. just you wait!
